mapper.select: SELECT (SUM(COALESCE(INCOME,0))) - (SUM(COALESCE(EXPENSE,0))) AS TOTAL_POINT FROM POINT WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no};

SELECT B.COUPON_NO, A.USER_NO, B.COUPON_NAME, B.COUPON_DISCOUNT, to_char(B.coupon_begin, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as coupon_begin, to_char(B.coupon_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as coupon_end, B.COUPON_USABLE, B.COUPON_TYPE, B.REMARKS FROM USERS AS A, COUPON AS B WHERE A.USER_NO = #{user_no} AND A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND coupon_end > now() AND COUPON_USABLE=TRUE
SELECT B.COUPON_NO, A.USER_NO, B.COUPON_NAME, B.COUPON_DISCOUNT, B.COUPON_TYPE FROM USERS AS A, COUPON AS B WHERE A.USER_NO = #{user_no } AND B.COUPON_NO = #{coupon_no}

SELECT SUM(ORDER_PRICE) AS ORDER_TOTALPRICE , COUNT(*) AS ORDER_COUNT, TO_CHAR(ORDER_TIME, 'DD') AS DAY FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') > #{start} AND TO_CHAR(ORDER_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') < #{end} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_TIME, 'DD') ORDER BY DAY
